subject: Basketball (College)
Coaches and Managers
Halls of Fame
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Louisville’s national title capped a tremendous run for Coach Rick Pitino, who was elected to the Hall of Fame, whose son was hired to coach Minnesota and whose horse won the Santa Anita Derby.
snippet: Louisville’s national title capped a tremendous run for Coach Rick Pitino, who was elected to the Hall of Fame, whose son was hired to coach Minnesota and whose horse won the Santa Anita Derby.
